name: SupportTicket
description: Technical support tickets for debugging Buildy apps

app_name.description: Name of the Buildy app with the issue

page_name.description: Specific page or feature where the issue occurs

expected_behavior.description: What should happen vs what is happening

code_snippet.description: Code snippet, error message, or stack trace

error_type.description: Type of error: Runtime Error, Build Error, UI Issue, Database Error, Integration Error, Other

priority.description: Priority level: low, medium, high, critical
